attributes.action: define a proportionate response when Israel is terrorized
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Israel targeted known Islamic terrorist locations there were the usual cries of ‘disproportionate response’. 

It seems everything Israel does is wrong, so please define what Israel should do. Ending the occupation of Gaza only served to increase attacks from there, so clearly ‘ending occupation' isn't the key to solving the problem.

And not fighting terror is ineffective since the Palestinian terror continues.

Can the gov’t clarify what exactly is proportionate: 
Should Israel dispatch a suicide bomber to a Palestinian civilian target after a Palestinian suicide terror attack on an Israeli civilian target? 
Should Israel launch rockets indiscriminately on Palestinian civilian locations after Palestinian rocket attacks?
Should Israel ensure an equal number of Israeli and Palestinian casualties?

If the UK can do a better job of fighting Islamic terrorists ‘proportionately’ then it is most welcome to come and help Israel.
